abstract: Suicide bombing attack on district court compound in northwestern city of Mardan kills at least 11 people and injures 20; Jamaat-e-Ahrar, offshoot of Pakistani Taliban, claims responsibility.

headline.print_headline: Bomber Kills 11 at Pakistani Court Complex
headline.main: Pakistan Suicide Bombing Kills at Least 11 at Court Compound

snippet: The assault at a district court in the city of Mardan was the second mass attack in recent weeks that appeared to target lawyers....
lead_paragraph: The assault at a district court in the city of Mardan was the second mass attack in recent weeks that appeared to target lawyers.
